name: Kitchen Still Life with a Maid and Young Boy
maker: Frans Snyders, with figures attributed to Jan Boeckhorst
description: Kitchen Still Life with a Maid and Young Boy; Frans Snyders (Flemish, 1579 - 1657), with figures attributed to Jan Boeckhorst (German, about 1604 - 1668); mid-17th century; Oil on canvas; 240 × 152.4 cm (94 1/2 × 60 in.); 78.PA.207; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Kitchen Still Life with a Maid and Young Boy
